title: BEST WATER VIEW IN MIAMI, FLORIDIAN SOBE!!
posting_body: ['The best views in South Beach!', 'Direct bay front.', 'Stunning views from the 31st floor lower penthouse level boasting high ceilings & open balcony.', 'Extended wrap-around terrace with sweeping views of Biscayne Bay and the ocean.', 'Fully remodeled two bed/two bath.', 'The Floridian offers luxury amenities including two bay front pools, tennis, gym, poolside food/beverage, concierge, valet, onsite gourmet market and more.', 'The West Ave neighborhood offers desirable shopping and restaurants in close proximity.', 'Walk to Publix & Whole Foods.', 'Easy access to I-395 and downtown Miami.', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
